recipe.title: Grilled Cheese and Kalua-Pig Sandwiches
ingredients: 4 thin slices mozzarella or Swedish Fontina
instructions: Butter 1 side of each baguette slice and sandwich 1 slice each of cheese and some pork between unbuttered sides to make 4 sandwiches. Grill sandwiches in a large nonstick skillet over moderate heat until golden and cheese is melted, about 1 minute on each side.
